name: Mychannel
0:
”Alexa, open my channel and ask for my subscriber count”
”Alexa, open my channel and ask how popular my last video is”
”Alexa, ask my channel for my last comment”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my channel
des:
You want quick & easy statistics about your YouTube channel? With this skill you can get easily your channel statistics for example your current subscriber count, how popular your last video is or what your last comment on your YouTube channel was.

Setup
------
To use this skill you need to link it with your YouTube channel. You can do this by asking Alexa the following: "Alexa, open my channel" then Alexa will ask for permissions to access your email address. This is necessary to send you an email with an link to setup the skill.

You can consent using your voice when Alexa is asking you for permissions or alternatively you can consent using the skill settings in the Alexa app.

Features
-------------

* Alexa, open my channel and ask for my subscriber count
-> Outputs your current subscriber count.

* Alexa, open my channel and ask how popular my last video is
-> Say you if your last video good from the average view and like count on your other videos.

* Alexa, open my channel and ask for my channel statistics
-> Gives you all your relevant channel statistics for example all time view or video count and more.

* Alexa, open my channel and ask for my last comment
-> Alexa will read out your last comment that is posted on any video on your channel

Contact
---------

Do you have questions, issues or feedback to my skill? Then write me an email to: mail@manuelschuler.dev

This skill is not associated with YouTube.
